item.title: Why deep learning? - Fastai miniseries - 01
item.description: Introduction (A brief note about the fastai mini-series) Why deep learning Myths about deep learning Glossary Introduction (A brief note about the fastai mini-series) I am beginning the 2018 iteration of the popular fastai course, Practical Deep Learning for Coders. Having been a passive listener to the previous iteration of the course, I know many of the key concepts in theory. However I plan to be a lot more involved with the practical aspects of the course this time.
